adrFormatAddress: 555 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

editorialSummary.text: Factory-authorized shop featuring new & pre-owned BMW cars plus a spacious service & parts center.

originalText.text: My salesman was Jorge, and I was with the BMW of Manhattan for three years. I bought my car in New Jersey. Save me the trip from going to New Jersey. I had no problems with BMW Of Manhattan. When it was time to check my vehicle, they would send me a video going over in detail with my car. And what needs to be done or close enough later must be replaced. They also have an indoor garage. It is Well attended. Jorge never hesitated if I needed to answer any questions and was transparent with our conversation.

originalText.text: Outstanding service. Quick and seamless. From  Rudy and the team were incredible. We came in on a Saturday afternoon and took our new car home on Tuesday. We would have done it sooner but the dealer is closed on Sunday. Fabulous experience and we are please with our new BMW.

text.text: Outstanding service. Quick and seamless. From  Rudy and the team were incredible. We came in on a Saturday afternoon and took our new car home on Tuesday. We would have done it sooner but the dealer is closed on Sunday. Fabulous experience and we are please with our new BMW.

originalText.text:
I wanted to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for the outstanding experience we had with Boyd during our recent interaction with BMW of Manhattan.

Boyd was an exceptional guide throughout the entire process. His communication was clear and frequent, ensuring we were well-informed every step of the way. His patience was especially appreciated, as he skillfully addressed all our questions and concerns, making us feel completely at ease.

It was indeed a smooth and enjoyable journey, and much of that credit goes to Boyd’s dedication and professionalism. We are thrilled to be a part of the BMW of Manhattan family, and it’s experiences like this that reinforce our decision.

text.text:

It was indeed a smooth and enjoyable journey, and much of that credit goes to Boyd’s dedication and professionalism. We are thrilled to be a part of the BMW of Manhattan family, and it’s experiences like this that reinforce our decision.

originalText.text:
Kenny Garcia, did an outstanding job as a salesperson. Very respectful, professional, and courteous. Everything worked like clock work, fast and efficient. Paperwork was streamlined and all questions answered. Attention to deal was high and you can see that he takes pride in his work. The entire place is top-tier from management level to front desk and it really shows. I’m genuinely impressed. These days it’s very rare unfortunately…

Also another member of team David was excellent as well. David, went over all the amazing features of the car and set everything up. He took his time to make me comfortable with all the tech. Kenny (Salesperson) and David (Tech) worked well as a team and made the entire transaction very smooth and pleasant!!!

originalText.text: Amazing experience from start to finish. My salesman Mike L. Made this process extremely simple from start, to finish. Stefanos was my product genius for my delivery, and he couldn’t have done a better job. Remember, heated seats GOOD!
